name: Sign In
description: User authentication screen for signing into the application

name: Sign Up
description: User registration screen for creating new accounts

name: Forgot Password
description: Password recovery screen for resetting user passwords

name: Dashboard
description: Main dashboard showing project overview and quick actions
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: My Projects
description: List view of all user projects with filtering and management options
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: Project Information
description: Form for creating new projects with basic information fields
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: Project Actions
description: Project management actions including edit, delete, and navigation
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: Excavation Screen
description: Excavation quality control form with measurements and documentation
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: Basics Screen
description: Basic project setup and configuration screen
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: White Concrete Screen
description: White concrete quality control and monitoring screen
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.

name: Home Screen
description: Home screen with project summary and recent activities
note: This screen requires user authentication to access.
